resources.string: This computer will be managed by ESET Remote Administrator
The following components are included in this installer
Install this free update to stay protected

${bts.package.[0].name} has to be updated to be compatible with Windows 10. The previously installed version could not be migrated to Windows 10. To stay protected, the newest version of this product can be downloaded and installed automatically.

The update is free and your license and settings will remain.
Enjoy safer browsing, gaming and connecting with the fast and powerful protection of ${bts.package.[0].name}. The solution eliminates a broad range of Internet threats.
Enjoy using your computer as you work, play and connect - protected by ${bts.package.[0].name}. The solution combines antimalware protection with antispam, personal firewall and parental control.
Enjoy using your computer as you work, play and connect - protected by ${bts.package.[0].name}. The solution combines antimalware protection with antispam, personal firewall and parental control.
Enjoy using your computer as you work, play and connect - protected by ${bts.package.[0].name}. The solution combines antimalware protection with antispam, personal firewall and parental control.
Enjoy using your computer as you work, play and connect - protected by ESET.
Advanced baseline protection for your business

${bts.package.[0].name}, featuring award-winning ESET NOD32速 detection technology, provides your business with lightweight, advanced baseline protection, augmented by our cloud-based reputation system. Control it all effortlessly with our completely redesigned, user-friendly ESET Remote Administrator web-console.

${bts.package.[0].name} is your full-featured, advanced security suite, providing comprehensive, multi-layered protection against all types of malware. Enjoy low system demands, virtualization support and oversight via the all-new ESET Remote Administrator web-console.
I want to uninstall unwanted antivirus applications using ESET AV Remover
A newer version of this product is available online and can be automatically downloaded and installed instead of included one.
${bts.package.[0].name} does not support this outdated version of Microsoft Windows. The most recent compatible version of {{IDS_ELI_PRODUCT_NAME_ESS}} will be installed.
${bts.package.[0].name} does not fully support this outdated version of Microsoft Windows. You can continue with the installation but problems may occur.
There is power in numbers. Get the maximum level of protection.

The ESET LiveGrid速 feedback system allows us to collect information about suspicious objects, which we process automatically to create detection mechanisms in our cloud system. We then immediately apply these to ensure that our customers have the maximum level of protection.
Help us provide you with ever-better security.

The ESET LiveGrid速 feedback system uses more than 100 million sensors worldwide that allow us to collect information about suspicious objects, which we process automatically to create detection mechanisms using our cloud-based reputation system. We then immediately apply these to ensure that you have the maximum level of protection.
What is a potentially unwanted application?

ESET can detect potentially unwanted applications and ask for confirmation before they install. Potentially unwanted applications might not pose security risk but they can affect computer's performance, speed and reliability, or cause changes in behavior. They usually require user's consent before installation.
For example, they may change your web browser's webpage and search settings.

ESET can detect potentially unwanted applications and ask for confirmation before they install. Potentially unwanted applications might not pose security risk but they can affect your computer's:
  • performance
  • speed
  • reliability
  • behavior
They usually require user's consent before installation.
Pick an option before you continue:
Disable detection of potentially unwanted applications
Enable detection of potentially unwanted applications
I want to specify different folders for files that change frequently
Other security software is present on the system or hasn't been removed completely. Running two security solutions at the same time may cause instability.
How to uninstall other antivirus software

Specialized cleaner is designed to remove complex malware from your computer. This application may cause stability issues and is recommended for advanced users only.
For more information visit our Knowledgebase.

Do you want to continue and run the cleaner?
No malware has been found on the system.
Malware was detected and cleaned from the system.

Malware has been detected on the system.
Please contact our Customer care for removal instructions.

Malware has been detected on the system. A reboot is required to finish the cleaning.
Please note that multiple reboots may be required.

Continue with reboot?

Specialized cleaner quit unexpectedly.
Please contact our Customer care for assistance.
Are you sure you want to cancel ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.default}].name} installation?

${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.default}].name} has been successfully installed on your computer. Your computer will be continuously checked for viruses and malware.

Click Done to complete the product setup and begin activation process.
${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.default}].name} has been successfully installed on your computer. Your computer will be continuously checked for viruses and malware.

Learn about security: ESET Knowledgebase
Connect with ESET: Facebook Twitter Youtube

ESET in collaboration with Masaryk University conducts a research focused on user security behavior.
Help us and fill out our short survey.

Your responses will help us to improve the overall security of ESET products.
By filling out this survey you agree that all contents may be analyzed by researchers from Masaryk University, but your data will be used for statistical purposes only. No identification data will be collected.

The installation of ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name} has not been completed successfully. The system may not be protected against computer threats. To install ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name} on your computer, please run the installation again.
Installation has been interrupted by user

The installation of ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.default}].name} has been interrupted by the user. To install ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.default}].name} on your computer, please run the installation again.
The installation was not completed successfully
This may be a result of malware activity. To check the system for potential threats it is recommended to run a Specialized cleaner.

There is not enough disk space on the volume %1% to download and start installation of ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.default}].name}.

Please make sure that you have at least %2!d! MB free and click Try again to check for available space again and continue download, or click Close to quit the installation.

There is not enough disk space on the volume %1% to complete installation of ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.default}].name}.

Please make sure that you have at least %2!d! MB free and click Try again to check for available space again and continue installation, or click Close to quit the installation.

Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and try again.

If you are still experiencing issues, please visit www.eset.com to download offline installer.

An error occured while downloading data from the server. Please check your network connection and try again.

If you are still experiencing issues, please visit www.eset.com to download offline installer.
An installation package not found on the server. Please visit www.eset.com to download offline installer.
An internal error occured. Please try again to start installation again.
An invalid response receiver from the server.
There is no compatible installation package available on the server. Please visit www.eset.com to download offline installer.

Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and try again. In case you are using a proxy server, change your proxy server settings.

If you are still experiencing issues, please visit www.eset.com to download offline installer.
A latest version of ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.default}].name} is already installed on this computer.
This installation package is intended for 64-bit operating systems. Please use an installation package for 32-bit operating systems.
This installation package is intended for 32-bit operating systems. Please use an installation package for 64-bit operating systems.
The ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name} is not intended for server operating systems. Please download and install a server product from www.eset.com.
The ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name} is not intended for server operating systems. Please download and install a client product from www.eset.com.
An incompatible {PRODUCT} product is already installed. Please uninstall it manually and start the installation again.
The ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name} is not intended for your operating systems. Please download and install a product from www.eset.com.
The ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name} installation package (${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].file}) was not found.

The installation of ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name} has not been completed successfully. The system may not be protected against computer threats. To install ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name} on your computer, please run the installation again.

You have insufficient rights to install ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name}. To install ${bts.package.[${bts.var.package.current}].name} on your computer, please run the installation again as an administrator.
This action will also close the Installation Wizard. Are you sure you want to do this?
